name: Vortigo - Bubble Shooter Game
description:
Shoot the bubbles into the vortex!
Match three or more bubbles of the same color to pop them, you'll have to use all bubbles before the first of the line reaches the end of the spiral.

Choose between three different modalities:
• Endless - reach the highest level, non-stop fun!
• Classic - enjoy every single level and get the high scores!
• Puzzle - coming soon!

You'll be able to boost your gaming experience by using special bubbles like:
• Bomb - pops nearby bubbles
• Rainbow - becomes a bubble of the first touched color
• Pause - stops the bubbles for 5 seconds
• Reverse - sends back bubbles

Vortigo is optimized for every screen size.
Play on the Apple Watch, use the Digital Crown to move and tap to shoot!

You can play this game on your iPhone, iPad and Apple Watch.

Shoot, Match and Pop!
